item.title: Beomaster 4000 Lamp Replacement
item.description: A simple way to replace the B&O filament lamps with LED's Background (Note this was first published on beoworld.org in 2021 but they removed the old posts) Like a lot older B&O systems, the Beomaster 4000 uses filament lamps. In most of the vintage B&O's these lamps are soldered but the lamps in the Beomaster 4000 fits into a holder. An ideal replacement would be LED's that directly fit into these holders.
